requirements.summary: Change the static menu data so the "Mineral Water" item renders with a ₹20 price badge in the menu UI and global search results.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/data/menuData.ts`, the item with `name: "Mineral Water"` is updated so the rendered price badge for that item shows ₹20.
On the /menu page, searching for "Mineral Water" shows the item with a price badge displaying ₹20.
On the /search page, searching for "Mineral Water" returns a menu result whose badge displays ₹20.

file_operations.description: Locate the menu item with `name: "Mineral Water"` and update its pricing to reflect an M.R.P. of 20 by setting `price: 20` (and removing/adjusting any conflicting `priceLabel` if present) so that existing UI formatting (which prefixes numeric prices with the rupee symbol) displays "₹20" consistently on the Menu page and in global search badges.
